input.sentences: let 's get the party going . it feels good to be with lovely friends .
this is my day . i hope what i wish for will come true .
who wants some drink and food ? so delicious !
thank you for the birthday present . i got something wonderful .
good friends stays faithful and they are always loyal .
output.sentences: It was a lovely party with friends.
She had hope that her friends would remain true to her on her special day.
The food and drinks that were served were delicious.
She stays loyal to all her friends.
